name: The Dreaded Return
description:
After a relaxing weekend in your family's old cabin, you start to head back to your car. Just as you are about to leave, you hear some strange noises. Grabbing your trusty hand-cranked flashlight and a shotgun from the gun cabinet, you start walking...

This game was originally developed as an entry for LD50, though we realised on the final day that we wouldn't make the deadline and while scrambling to get everything in order and produce a working build, we ultimately made the call to stop and go to bed. We never really had the motivation to finish the game after that and as such it has been resting on our GitHub for over a year, 99% complete...until now when we finally got everything fixed, built and uploaded!

Thank you for playing, we hope you enjoyed the experience. Feel free to rate and leave feedback if you have the time.

Controls MouseAimLMBShootW/A/S/DUp/Left/Down/Right
R
Reload
E (Hold)Recharge flashlightFInteractQPause Cheats Left_shift+1Infinite healthLeft_shift+2Unlimited ammoLeft_shift+3Unlimited flashlight battery
